entry.title: Implications Of WordPress Joining The Block Protocol
entry.summary: In this article, Leonardo Losoviz discusses some potential consequences as well as positive outcomes of WordPress joining the Block Protocol.

entry.title: Everything You Want To Know About Creating Voice User Interfaces
entry.summary: Voice is a powerful tool that we can use to communicate with each other. This article covers the most critical aspects of designing for voice user interfaces: designing the conversation and designing visual interfaces.
